description: The Sub-Mission on Agricultural Mechanization (SMAM) promotes the use of modern farm machinery through subsidies to enhance productivity and reduce labor dependency.
key_features: Subsidies for tractors, harvesters, and other machinery
50% subsidy for general farmers, 90% for SC/ST farmers

benefits.subsidy: Up to 90% for SC/ST farmers, 50% for others

criteria: Priority to small, marginal, and SC/ST farmers

steps: Apply through SMAM portal or agriculture department
Submit machinery purchase plan and documents

special_notes: Focus on custom hiring centers for machinery access
